Strategic sectors, particularly those aligned with sustainable development and technological advancement, are attracting attention, but a more robust and stable investment environment is deemed necessary to unlock higher levels of FDI and foster long-term economic growth [[REF:dinero_2026_01_10_politica_fiscal_gobierno_11223]].
